title: Riot please tell me Zoe is getting a login theme...
body:
~~Projects are amazing and all, love the art style, but please don't tell me you got nothing for Zoe ! She's a whole new champ she deserves the love. I can't recall a single recent champion that didn't get its login screen and theme to go with it. Zoe didn't get a promo teaser like Jhin or heavenly music like Ornn so at least something, anything!~~


Well sorry folks i might have rushed things a bit but it should be coming soon alongside Projects !

replies.body: Of course she is

Thank you Riot!


:)


(i should have just guessed by the audio in her teaser trailer tbh...mb).
It's on PBE now!

https://i.gyazo.com/17061cdc779f7b2d8e929af2f013af98.png

http://memes.ucoz.com/_nw/0/33783348.jpg
What the? Of course she will get a login. A new champ have ALWAYS gotten a login since they started doing that back in 2012 (season 2). Why wouldn't she?

Well because of the Project login i was afraid it would overlapse the champion's over a full patch cycle obviously, but then yea i just realize they might first launch the Zoe one then the skins usually come later and stay focused for a week or two then the champs come back 'till some new major content. I guess i just went too fast 


{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

Ah yes, a heat of the moment post where emotions run high & you don't have time to think things through.
Eh, it happens to all of us.
New champions always get a login theme. There is no precedent that would suggest otherwise.
Sorry, I was down to the wire finishing animation on this one my dude! And the full 1080p version is coming soon :)
{{sticker:sg-lux}}
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Generally in the case of multiple login themes being available, the client will perform a priority check. The PROJECT: login theme should last for roughly a week prior to and post release. Zoe's will generally be the same time, though her's will likely be up until riot releases another login theme. Don't worry, she'll get her love^
{{sticker:sg-kiko}}

is this enough? :)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zn8XmDJ6M8c

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2017/11/1114-pbe-update-zoe-login-theme.html

There's no loggin' theme at all there.

0/10 much disappointment.

Huh? {{sticker:sg-lux-2}} 

i posted a link to the video of the login screen, and another to the post on surrenderat20 with the PBE update containing that same video :?
I made a pun using the word loggin' (logging) instead of log in.
While blitz skins are not even here
Likely Zoe will have her theme for the first week or so, then a couple of days around the PROJECT release will have that theme, than back to Zoes.
I see you snagged an early name.
NO! I want to keep EVE theme.
